thread.title: BRIEF-CB Financial & First West Virginia Bancorp Receive Stockholder Approval For Pending Merger

title: BRIEF-CB Financial & First West Virginia Bancorp Receive Stockholder Approval For Pending Merger

organizations.name: brief-cb financial & first west virginia bancorp
stockholder approval for pending merger reuters staff

text:
April 12, 2018 / 6:11 PM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-CB Financial & First West Virginia Bancorp Receive Stockholder Approval For Pending Merger Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - CB Financial Services Inc : 
* CB FINANCIAL SERVICES, INC. AND FIRST WEST VIRGINIA BANCORP, INC. RECEIVE STOCKHOLDER APPROVAL FOR PENDING MERGER 
* CB AND FIRST WEST VIRGINIA EXPECT TO COMPLETE MERGER ON OR ABOUT APRIL 30, 2018 
* OVER 99% OF VOTES CAST AT EACH MEETING WERE CAST IN FAVOR OF DEAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
